mapper.select: select qno, title, content, writer, password, state, reg_date as regDate from Question ORDER BY reg_date DESC LIMIT #{offset},10;
mapper.insert: insert into Question(title, content, writer, password, reg_date) VALUES (#{title},#{content},#{writer},#{password},now());
mapper.select: select * from Question where qno=#{qno} and password=#{password};
